This is a follow-up of https://github.com/neovim/neovim/pull/33440, as [the spec says that this is basically a resolve request for `textDocument/documentColor`](https://microsoft.github.io/language-server-protocol/specifications/lsp/3.18/specification/#textDocument_colorPresentation).

Preview of how this looks:

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/80131692-f62f-4da3-beed-4352a96dc7d2

comment_data.body: Unlikely to happen, but I think this will fail in some cases where the range is multiline. E.g. if a color span ranges from start pos (0, 0) to end pos (2, 0), we should consider the cursor position (1, 5) to be inside it (since it is between lines 0 and 2). However, this code will consider it outside because the cursor col (5) > end position col (0). Might be easier to pack the hl range into a 4-tuple and reuse the logic from `treesitter._range`?
